screenshots.caption: Solarwinds Response Time Viewer for Wireshark®

name: Response Time Viewer for Wireshark®
short_description:
Wireshark’s powerful deep packet capture provides a wealth of information to help you troubleshoot performance problems, but analyzing that data can frighten even the most hardened IT pro. Now there’s no need to be afraid of the shark when you have SolarWinds® FREE Response Time Viewer for Wireshark.

With this easy-to-use desktop application, you can:
• Easily analyze common Wireshark packet capture files
• Calculate and display network and application response time
• Identify applications
• Calculate and display data and transaction volume

SolarWinds Response Time Viewer is a free desktop utility meant for IT professionals within enterprises of all sizes. SolarWinds software is used by over 150,000 customers worldwide and includes over 400 of the Fortune 500.
summary: Easily Analyze Wireshark Packet Capture Files
